synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaking in fresh DMF for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The solvent-accessible void volume estimated by PLATON is 39.2% of the whole structure. Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) data reveal a 41.0% weight loss at 25–300 °C.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaking in fresh DMF for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: K+ ion is located 0.0764(0.0061) (cid:2) above the mean plane of 18Cr6 and it is coordinated with two water molecules at the axial sites.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaking in fresh DMF for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: NH4+ ion is positioned 1.577 (0.035) (cid:2) above the mean plane of 18Cr6. The NH4+ ion forms hydrogen bonds with the oxygen atoms of the crown ether.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaking in fresh DMF for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: MV2+ resides beside the 18-crown-6 moiety of SNU-200. A maximum of 4 methyl viologen molecules could be accommodated per unit cell.
